menuItems.name: Martini
menuItems.recipe: Mix 3 parts vodka & 1 part dry vermouth.

menuItems.name: Negroni
menuItems.description: A nice drink for a late night conversation.
menuItems.recipe: Mix equal parts of gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth.
menuItems.serve: Serve cold, either on the rocks or straight up.

menuItems.name: Gin and Tonic
menuItems.description: Like regular tonic, but with gin.
menuItems.recipe: Mix 2 parts gin & 1 part tonic water.
menuItems.serve: Serve in a tall glass over ice, garnished with a lime wedge.

menuItems.name: Nachos
menuItems.recipe: Cover expensive, organic tortilla chips with Cheez Whiz.
menuItems.serve: Serve in a hand-thrown ceramic bowl, garnished with canned black olives

menuItems.name: Hummus
menuItems.description: Sure to impress your vegan friends!
menuItems.serve: Place unceremoniously on the table, along with pita bread.

menuItems.name: Arugula and Walnut Salad
menuItems.recipe: Mix arugula, toasted walnuts, and thinly-sliced Parmesan cheese. Dress with lemon and olive oil.
menuItems.serve: Place on tiny, precious little plates.

menuItems.name: Cotton Candy
menuItems.description: Enjoy some fluffy cotton candy to make you happy.
